features: [ Daily Oily Skin Control ] A lightweight gel moisturizer with salicylic acid, protects and relieves congested skin. While niacinamide helps to minimize the appearance of pores.
[ Organic Gel Moisturizer ] Made with natural actives like, chamomile, vitamin c, and green tea extract.
[ Lightweight and Gentle ] A daily niacinamide moisturizer with a lightweight texture and gentle application. Helps gently protect your skin and minimize pores.
[ For Oily and Acne Prone Skin ] Formulated to help minimize shine and maintain excess oils, all while keeping skin moisturized, hydrated, and protected.
[ Cruelty-Free & Manufactured in the UK ] Facetheory is Leaping Bunny-certified cruelty-free. Our products contain no parabens, silicones, PEGS, SLS, SLES, or mineral oils.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How does this benefit oily skin? Supergel Moisturizer M3 is an oil-free moisturizer specially formulated for combination or oily skin that's prone to breakouts. It contains Niacinamide and Salicylic acid to reduces pore size and regulate production of sebum. How often can I use Supergel Moisturizer M3? Our Supergel Moisturizer can be used twice daily, morning or night. Does this help with breakout prone skin? Yes, loaded with naturally sourced, organic, ingredients that clarify the skin without blocking pores while salicylic acid relieves congestion without causing irritation. Are your products tested on animals? Facetheory is Leaping Bunny-certified cruelty-free. Our products contain no parabens, silicones, PEGS, SLS, SLES, or mineral oils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I needed for my oily skin
reviews.reviewText: This product works perfectly. It’s simple yet effective. I use four small dots on each section of my face. It’s enough to cover my face and neck area. This moisturizer is great for South Florida’s weather, where it’s technically warm all year. It’s super lightweight which makes adding SPF on top that much easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just loved this moisturiser. It fits to all types of skin tones. It gives a high level of glow to your make-up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Still makes my face oily after use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new standard in daily skincare!
reviews.reviewText: I use to use a daily moisturizer cream, but since my main issue has been enlarged pores and blackheads, the cream was clogging my pores and keeping them enlarge. I've been using this gel for over 3 months now and will be keeping with this for now on. It's light weight, has 2 of the key actives I need (Niacinamide and Vitamin C), unscented, and does its job of daily moisturizing! While I still have an issue with enlarged pores and blackheads, I've noticed then haven't been getting worst. A+++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now a regular part of my skincare
reviews.reviewText: I saw this moisturizer recommended by Dr. V on YouTube. I have very oily, acne-prone skin. I have used this for over a month and I love it. It’s moisturizing w/o being greasy or irritating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Still left dry skin
reviews.reviewText: My skin care routine called for a gel moisturizer. This one is just OK, I often had to follow up with a cream moisturizer during cold weather to prevent dry flakes of skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: Had to switch to this since my previous cream got discontinued but I love this gel! I have t-zone oily/ combination skin and I only use a little dab (morning and night). It seriously covers my whole face. Since it's a gel, you do have to be mindful not to use too much or it may clog your pores more. I pair it with a light moisturizer cream for my spf and to lock in the gel moisturizer agent, and my skin is so soft. Hoping they don't discontinue this ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT FOR COMBO SKIN.
reviews.reviewText: I have combo skin and no acne. I saw this on a YouTube video and was recommended for oily/combo skin. I decided to try it and it left me very sticky and oily within an hour. Extremely upsetting and disappointed. Do not buy if you are oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read some mixed reviews about this but glad I went ahead and purchased it. I have suffered with blemished skin for a long time and this has made a massive improvement in just two weeks. I use morning and night. I generally have oily skin and this has helped control that as well.
I hated the product, waste of money for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this gel cream on my clients before their makeup and the result is lovely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down THE BEST moisturiser for oily and sensitive skin. The consistency is odd the first few times but you get used to it and it doesn't feel heavy under suncream. Also the ingredients and great for skin and all in all a wonderful product. The only problem is how much the price has gone up in such a short amount of time! I know with inflation and everything that's bound to happen but when I first starting buying this about a year ago it was £11 but is now £16 so hard to justify to keep buying even though I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Think I have found a gem for oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I have mature oily skin and read the reviews about this product. I've now been using it for a week and I am really impressed. After a day at work my face definitely does not feel or look as greasy.
